global.title: Visible Mold
global.description: Check for visible mold or mildew on walls, ceilings, or corners

global.title: Paint Condition
global.description: Assess the condition of visible wall/ceiling paint

house_level.title: Roof Visible Damage
house_level.description: Check for cracked tiles, holes, or missing roof elements

house_level.title: Exterior Walls Condition
house_level.description: Assess visible exterior walls from outside photos

custom_items.title: Mirror Condition
custom_items.description: Check if bathroom mirrors are intact and clean

custom_items.title: Countertop Condition
custom_items.description: Check if kitchen countertop surface is in good shape

custom_items.title: Curtains / Blinds Condition
custom_items.description: Check if curtains or blinds exist and their condition

custom_items.title: Fridge Door Condition
custom_items.description: Check fridge door appearance for dents or rust

custom_items.title: Upholstery Condition
custom_items.description: Check sofa fabric or leather for visible wear
